name: A thick polished adamantite belt
data: It increases the users strength a bit.
It increases the users dexterity somewhat.
It increases the users constitution a bit.
It has awesome armour class for its type (pathetic in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration noticably.
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration poorly.
It increases the users physical resistance strongly.
This item loses its magical powers slowly.
The wearer becomes more attuned to the elemental forces.
